alert.note: Alert for Benton (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 20 at 10:01AM PST until December 20 at 4:05PM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Oregon... Siuslaw River near Mapleton affecting Lane County. Marys River near Philomath affecting Benton County. For the Nw Oregon / Sw Washington Coast...including Willapa, Naselle, Rosburg, Vernonia, Foss, Tillamook, Tillamook, Beaver, Siletz, Tidewater, Mapleton...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING THROUGH THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Marys River near Philomath. * WHEN...Until late this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Above 20.0 feet, expect widespread low land and agricultural flooding. Numerous roads along the Marys are affected, and some structures near the river may begin to flood. Expect river flooding in south Corvallis as well as parts of Hwy 99W, as well as parts of south Philomath. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10 AM PST Monday, the stage was 20.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is nearing a crest of 20.7 feet. The river will begin receding this afternoon, dropping back below flood stage later tonight. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this afternoon by 3 PM PST.
